description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Potato Oven Baked Chips With Avocado Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet Potato Oven Baked Chips With Avocado Dip
name: Sweet Potato Oven Baked Chips With Avocado Dip Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, place remaining ingredients in a bowl and mash with a fork to combine. Transfer to a small dip bowl and serve with baked sweet potato chips.
